scripts.build: tsc --build dataregistry dataregistry-registry dataregistry-csvviewer dataregistry-extension && jlpm workspace @jupyterlab/dataregistry-extension run generateSchema && jlpm workspace @jupyterlab/dataregistry-csvviewer run generateSchema
scripts.build:dev: jlpm install && jlpm clean && jlpm run build && jlpm run link
scripts.lint: jlpm workspace @jupyterlab/dataregistry-extension lint && jlpm workspace @jupyterlab/dataregistry-csvviewer lint && jlpm workspace @jupyterlab/dataregistry-registry lint
scripts.clean: jlpm workspace @jupyterlab/dataregistry run clean && jlpm workspace @jupyterlab/dataregistry-extension run clean && jlpm workspace @jupyterlab/dataregistry-csvviewer run clean && jlpm workspace @jupyterlab/dataregistry-registry run clean
scripts.link: jupyter labextension link dataregistry --no-build && jupyter labextension link dataregistry-registry && jupyter labextension link dataregistry-csvviewer && jupyter labextension link dataregistry-extension
scripts.unlink: jupyter labextension unlink dataregistry --no-build && jupyter labextension unlink dataregistry-extension && jupyter labextension unlink dataregistry-csvviewer && jupyter labextension unlink dataregistry-registry
